title: Update branding to “Quick bee Agency” and replace site logo with uploaded Quick bee logo

requirements.text: Update the site’s brand name to “Quick bee Agency” in the centralized frontend site configuration so that all components that read from siteConfig display the new name.

quotes: use this as logo & name the website Quick bee Agency

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/config/site.ts sets siteConfig.name to exactly "Quick bee Agency".
Header and footer (and any other UI that reads siteConfig.name) display “Quick bee Agency” without hardcoded old branding.

requirements.text: Update the HTML document title to use the new brand name “Quick bee Agency”.

quotes: name the website Quick bee Agency

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html <title> is updated to include “Quick bee Agency” (and no longer shows the old generic project title).

requirements.text: Replace the current generated logo asset used in the header and footer with the user-uploaded Quick bee logo, ensuring it renders crisply on the dark theme and works at the existing header/footer logo size.
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo and footer logo visually match the user-uploaded Quick bee logo.
No layout shift occurs in the header or footer; the logo remains approximately the same rendered size as before.
Logo has a transparent background (or blends cleanly) on the site’s dark/charcoal background.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; no new backend services.
nonGoals: Changing site copy, pricing, services, or page structure beyond updating branding and logo.
Adding new authentication methods beyond Internet Identity.

edits: Replace the existing generated logo with the uploaded Quick bee logo and export a wide wordmark with transparent background (agency-logo.dim_512x256.png > agency-logo-quickbee.dim_512x256.png)
